definitions.text: a small tufted beard worn by Emperor Napoleon III
a piece of luggage carried on top of a coach
relating to or associated with an empire
examples: the imperial gallon was standardized legally throughout the British Empire

definitions.text: of or belonging to the British Imperial System of weights and measures
befitting or belonging to an emperor or empress
belonging to or befitting a supreme ruler
examples: the royal carriage of a stag's head
